meanings.definition: The times at which a television or radio program is broadcast.
meanings.sent1: The airtimes for the new show are 8 PM on Mondays.
meanings.sent2: I always watch my favorite show during its airtimes.
meanings.sent3: I missed the airtimes for the game, so I had to catch the highlights.
meanings.sent4: The airtimes of the morning news are like clockwork.
meanings.sent5: Remember to check the airtimes for the special episode next week.

meanings.definition: The amount of time an advertisement is shown on television or radio.
meanings.sent1: The company purchased multiple airtimes for their new commercial.
meanings.sent2: The airtimes for the ad were strategically chosen for maximum exposure.
meanings.sent3: The airtimes for the infomercial were late at night when most people are asleep.
meanings.sent4: The airtimes for the campaign ad coincided with popular TV shows.
meanings.sent5: Securing prime airtimes can significantly impact the success of an ad.
